name: Ammad Iftikhar
tagline: I build dynamic, responsive, user-friendly web apps.
summary: Passionate and detail-oriented Front-End Developer with expertise in React.js, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS. I build dynamic, responsive, and user-friendly web applications with a focus on performance and clean UI/UX. My approach combines technical excellence with creative problem-solving to deliver exceptional user experiences.

experience.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Developing new features and maintaining projects in ReactJS and CodeIgniter
Shipping scalable, high-performance UIs that serve thousands of users
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver pixel-perfect designs

experience.title: Internee
highlights: Built optimized React components for dynamic, responsive applications
Improved interactivity and UX through data-driven design decisions
Gained hands-on experience with modern frontend development practices

projects.name: AI Attorney
projects.summary: Built landing, draft, and library  for an AI-powered legal platform that helps lawyers streamline their workflow and access legal resources efficiently.

projects.name: Metro Pakistan
projects.summary: Employee assessment application enabling comprehensive performance evaluation workflows for large organizations with detailed reporting and analytics.

projects.name: Campus Pro
projects.summary: Comprehensive audit system designed for nonprofit school operations, enabling efficient management of academic processes and administrative tasks.

projects.name: Office Management System
projects.summary: Centralized platform for employee records management, leave tracking, and attendance monitoring with automated workflows and notifications.

projects.name: Event Visita
projects.summary: A full-stack event booking website where users can browse company profiles, book events, and manage their bookings. Admins use a dashboard to approve events, add new events, and curate an image/gallery section. Includes a polished landing page.

projects.name: HavenCraft
projects.summary: A modern, responsive home décor website showcasing living spaces, services, and blogs. Users can explore dining, bedroom, and kitchen designs with eco-friendly collections, while a sleek landing page highlights the brand’s style-first approach.
features: Responsive landing page with modern layouts

projects.name: Decora Studio
projects.summary: A modern interior design and furniture e-commerce platform that blends aesthetics with usability. Users can browse premium collections, explore curated materials, and shop directly, while sections highlight quality, delivery, and support. The responsive landing page uses a polished olive-green theme to convey elegance and trust.
features: Hero landing page with interior design theme
Product showcase with pricing and buy options
Why Choose Us section (Quality, Delivery, Return, Support)
Blog and inspiration sections for interiors
Integrated shopping cart and contact system

projects.name: WanderLocal
projects.summary: A modern travel platform that connects explorers with local guides for authentic experiences. Users can search destinations, filter by travel dates, and explore curated local insights, blogs, and client stories—all within a sleek, responsive interface.
features: Search destinations with traveler and date filters
Blog and story section for inspiration
Integrated contact and social media links

projects.name: ZeroKoin
projects.summary: ZeroKoin is a next-generation crypto platform that combines tokenized learning, smart tools, and real-world rewards. It empowers users to start their journey from zero and grow with purpose through a secure, modern, and intuitive interface.
features: Buy ZeroKoin and download app directly
Vision, mission, and key features highlights
Why We Exist cards with detailed explanations
Responsive and futuristic landing page design
